New Records: Aiden Markram recorded the fastest World Cup 100
Key Match Events: KL Rahul smashes a six over extra cover to win the match
Three ducks at the start of the innings gave the Aussies hope
Once Kohli was dropped on 12 that hope was extinguished by as good a partnership as there could be
Pre-Game Insights: India captain Rohit Sharma on starting with a win: "Pretty exciting. A good feeling to come out on top."
Australia captain Pat Cummins was left to rue the drop of Kohli early in the chase: "Not ideal â€“ especially someone of his calibre."
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma remarked that winning the series was a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
KL Rahul was trying to go inside out with the field up in the circle but the timing was too good.
A chanceless innings from Rahul and fitting that he hit the winning runs even if he missed out on the hundred.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dutch made their way into the tournament at the expense of the West Indies, Ireland and Zimbabwe via the qualifiers hosted by the latter.
India have sent a clear message to all their challengers in their opening game.
Australia have one more day to rest and recover from the Indian hiding before they face a huge task against South Africa in Lucknow on Thursday.
Others: The Kiwis, of course, looking to go two from two after handing out some revenge to England after their defeat in the 2019 final.
